argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringmgp.g | |- G = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = G ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( mulGrp ` r ) e. CMnd <-> G e. CMnd ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-cring | |- CRing = { r e. Ring | ( mulGrp ` r ) e. CMnd } |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( R e. CRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ G e. CMnd ) ) |
